Description:
Monitoring the transmission process of DMI channels, beginning with the transmission room and ending with the satellite.
Ensuring the return of broadcasting in the ideal way and resolving the problem as quickly as possible in the event of a broadcast interruption.
Receiving the signal, testing it and ensuring that it conforms to the standards before re- broadcasting.
Coordinating with the recording department to record all the events received by MCR after verifying their suitability.
Coordinating with the satellite broadcast (SNG) engineers, outside broadcast(OB )engineers and master Control Room engineers of the feed provider, to ensure optimal quality broadcasting.Qualification: Bachelor’s degree in Telecommunications Engineering or equivalent from a recognized university.Experience: 0-3Job Details
